localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
blogPost.body: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
blogPost.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.
blogPost.author: James Potter

localize.description: 我们根据Apple Podcasts中的 "听众也订阅 "数据收集了280万个播客连接。现在，你可以在3D图中直观地看到任何播客的邻居（以及它的邻居的邻居），并看到哪些其他播客有类似的听众。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可视化播客的受众连接。

localize.description: 我們根據Apple Podcasts中的 "聽衆也訂閱 "數據收集了280萬個播客連接。現在，你可以在3D圖中直觀地看到任何播客的鄰居（以及它的鄰居的鄰居），並看到哪些其他播客有類似的聽衆。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可視化播客的受衆連接。

previous.excerpt: Zepel is the project management software that takes you beyond simple issue tracking. This way, you can plan features, track progress of your entire product development process, and ship customer-focussed software painlessly.
previous.title: Zepel 2.0 - Jira alternative for software product teams

localize.description: Zepel是一款项目管理软件，它不仅仅是简单的问题跟踪。通过这种方式，您可以规划功能，跟踪整个产品开发过程的进展，并以客户为中心的软件无痛地发货。
localize.tagline: 软件产品团队的Jira替代方案

localize.description: Zepel是一款項目管理軟件，它不僅僅是簡單的問題跟蹤。通過這種方式，您可以規劃功能，跟蹤整個產品開發過程的進展，並以客戶爲中心的軟件無痛地發貨。
localize.tagline: 軟件產品團隊的Jira替代方案
